ModMetaData.name: ProgrammableVents
ModMetaData.author: Linkolas
ModMetaData.description:
Adds programmable vents! ProgrammableVents lets you target a temperature and will only let air flow when useful.
The logic is quite simple; the air will only flow in these configurations: - Room 1 T° ≤ Target T° ≤ Room 2 T° - Room 1 T° ≥ Target T° ≥ Room 2 T° This means it will let the air flow only when it would help a room reach the target temperature.
See project's GitHub page for older RimWorld versions (A16+).
